Package ohos.ai.asr

Class AsrIntent

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.ai.asr.AsrIntent

  • public class AsrIntent
extends Object
    Provides input parameters for executing ASR engine methods.
    Since:
    3

        public AsrIntent​()

    • Method Detail

      • getVadEndWaitMs

        public int getVadEndWaitMs​()
        Obtains the post-VAD threshold. VAD stands for voice activity detection.

        If the silence period in the middle of a user's utterances reaches the post-VAD threshold, speech recognition will stop.

        Returns:
        Returns the post-VAD threshold, in milliseconds.
        Since:
        3

      • setVadEndWaitMs

        public void setVadEndWaitMs​(int vadEndWaitMs)
        Sets the post-VAD threshold.

        If the silence period in the middle of a user's utterances reaches the post-VAD threshold, speech recognition will stop.

        Parameters:
        vadEndWaitMs - Indicates the post-VAD threshold. The value ranges from 500 to 10000 (default value: 2000}, in milliseconds. If this parameter is set to a value beyond this range, the valid post-VAD threshold set most recently will be used.
        Since:
        3

      • getVadFrontWaitMs

        public int getVadFrontWaitMs​()
        Obtains the pre-VAD threshold.

        If the silence period before any utterances are captured reaches the pre-VAD threshold, speech recognition will stop.

        Returns:
        Returns the pre-VAD threshold, in milliseconds.
        Since:
        3

      • setVadFrontWaitMs

        public void setVadFrontWaitMs​(int vadFrontWaitMs)
        Sets the pre-VAD threshold.

        If the silence period before any utterances are captured reaches the pre-VAD threshold, speech recognition will stop.

        Parameters:
        vadFrontWaitMs - Indicates the pre-VAD threshold. The value ranges from 500 to 10000 (default value: 4800), in milliseconds. If this parameter is set to a value beyond this range, the valid pre-VAD threshold set most recently will be used.
        Since:
        3

      • getTimeoutThresholdMs

        public int getTimeoutThresholdMs​()
        Obtains the ASR timeout threshold.
        Returns:
        Returns the ASR timeout threshold, in milliseconds.
        Since:
        3

      • setTimeoutThresholdMs

        public void setTimeoutThresholdMs​(int timeoutThresholdMs)
        Sets the ASR timeout threshold.

        The input parameter timeoutThresholdMs takes effect in AsrClient.startListening(AsrIntent) but not in AsrClient.init(AsrIntent, AsrListener).

        Parameters:
        timeoutThresholdMs - Indicates the ASR timeout threshold. The value ranges from 1 to 20000 (default value: 20000), in milliseconds. If this parameter is set to a value beyond this range, the invalid ASR timeout threshold set most recently will be used.
        Since:
        3

      • getFilePath

        public String getFilePath​()
        Obtains the path of an audio file.
        Returns:
        Returns the audio file path.
        Since:
        3

      • setFilePath

        public void setFilePath​(String filePath)
        Sets the path of the audio file to be recognized.

        To ensure that ASR can take effect on audio files, you must call setAudioSourceType(ohos.ai.asr.AsrIntent.AsrAudioSrcType) with AsrAudioSrcType#ASR_SRC_TYPE_FILE as the input parameter before calling AsrClient#init(AsrIntent, AsrListener) to initialize the ASR engine.

        Parameters:
        filePath - Indicates the path of the audio file to be recognized.
        Since:
        3

      • getAudioSourceType

        public int getAudioSourceType​()
        Obtains the audio source type.
        Returns:
        Returns the audio source type represented by an integer, as defined in AsrAudioSrcType.
        Since:
        3

      • setAudioSourceType

        public void setAudioSourceType​(AsrIntent.AsrAudioSrcType audioSourceType)
        Sets the audio source type.
        Parameters:
        audioSourceType - Indicates the audio source type. The default value is AsrAudioSrcType#ASR_SRC_TYPE_FILE.
        Since:
        3

      • getEngineType

        public int getEngineType​()
        Obtains the ASR engine type.
        Returns:
        Returns the ASR engine type represented by an integer, as defined in AsrEngineType.
        Since:
        3

      • setEngineType

        public void setEngineType​(AsrIntent.AsrEngineType engineType)
        Sets the ASR engine type.
        Parameters:
        engineType - Indicates the ASR engine type. The default value is AsrEngineType#ASR_ENGINE_TYPE_LOCAL.
        Since:
        3
        See Also:
        AsrIntent.AsrEngineType
